# Instructions Folder

This folder contains all workflow, style, and template instructions for maintaining the campaign wiki. Each file addresses a specific aspect of the documentation process.

## Structure

- `workflows/` — Step-by-step guides for documentation and update processes
- `templates/` — File templates for session notes, characters, places, organisations, etc.
- `style-guide.md` — Language, formatting, and linking conventions

## Contents

- `workflows/session-note-workflow.md`: Session note ingestion and reference update workflow
- `templates/template-session-note.md`: Template for new session notes
- `templates/template-character.md`: Template for character reference files
- `templates/template-place.md`: Template for place reference files
- `templates/template-organisation.md`: Template for organisation reference files
- (Add more templates as needed for items, religions, etc.)
